snippet: Federer announced that Edberg, his boyhood idol and assistant coach, would be replaced by Ivan Ljubicic, Federer’s good friend.
abstract: Roger Federer announces departure of assistant coach Stefan Edberg from his staff.
lead_paragraph: Federer announced that Edberg, his boyhood idol and assistant coach, would be replaced by Ivan Ljubicic, Federer’s good friend.

headline.main: Roger Federer Drops Stefan Edberg From Coaching Staff
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Edberg Leaving Federer’s Staff
